body_html: @martin-gorner, @edubergeek, and @jeandut I'm almost in a similar situation but in case of convolution layer, I'm trying to visualize a deconvolution layer. The shape of the layer is (5, 100, 100, 3) in NHWC format. Basically, I need 100 x 300 grids but when I'm implementing the above concept I'm getting an error "ValueError: Cannot reshape a tensor". Any idea how can I solve this issue?
